Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide

Class View

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<java.lang.Object>
it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.View
All Implemented Interfaces:
MVEventListener, ViewSender, java.lang.Runnable
public class View
extends Observable<java.lang.Object>
implements MVEventListener, java.lang.Runnable, ViewSender
Class that connects the View with the connection (and so with the Server).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private class  View.ChatMessageReceiver
    Helper inner class aimed to handle chat messages received form the connection socket.
